author: Brian Faler
title: IRS official: Virus outbreak making it hard to implement key business tax provision
description: Office closures are making it difficult to process quick refunds.
content: Other than our one service center in Ogden, [Utah,] all of our service centers have been closed because of shelter in place, Lough said in a panel discussion sponsored by the American Bar Association. So forms like 1139 that are mailed to the service centers … [+795 chars]
